Unity in Christ Jesus 

           Loma Linda, California, August 24, 1905. 

To Our Brethren Connected With the Publishing Work 
     at College View-- 
     While attending the council meeting of the General Conference Committee, held in September, 1904, my mind was deeply exercised regarding the unity that should attend our work. I was not able to attend all the meetings, but in the night season scene after scene passed before me, and I felt that I had a message to bear to our people in many places.
